name: Passing By
description:
Made for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. A young girl gets on a train to see where it'll take her.

The game is currently very unpolished and pretty short. Any bugs and incomplete graphics will be fixed in future updates. As of now there are 3 equippable items and about 8 accessible areas.

7/10/17 edit: The current version is being hidden, and the download will be replaced with the next update when it's done.
